artist: Designer: John Prip; Manufacturer: Reed & Barton
creditline: Gift of Christopher P. Monkhouse in honor of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
description: flat base; body flares out from base, in at mouth; slightly concave cover with triangular finial, rounded at top

title: Sugar bowl from the "Denmark" coffee service
